name: Chop Down Every Tree in The Forest: A Simulation
name_original: Chop Down Every Tree in The Forest: A Simulation
description:
This is a short puzzlescript experience about my experiences dealing with wood heat in the winter.

If you like it, please consider supporting it with a donation, and check out my Patreon!

If you have trouble getting the game to work, try clicking inside the game window area.

Source Code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=4726d7d18cd855627898f26e70babf77
